scripts.liboqs:build:windows: cd deps/liboqs && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -G "Visual Studio 17 2022" -A x64 -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DOQS_BUILD_ONLY_LIB=ON -DOQS_USE_OPENSSL=ON -DOQS_DIST_BUILD=ON .. && msbuild ALL_BUILD.vcxproj
scripts.prep: npx rimraf deps && mkdir deps && cd deps && git clone https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs.git && git clone https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-cpp.git && cd liboqs && git checkout f4b96220 && cd ../liboqs-cpp && git checkout 7e293be && cd ./include && echo "#ifndef LIBOQS_CPP_VERSION" > temp_common.hpp && echo "#define LIBOQS_CPP_VERSION \"0.12.0\"" >> temp_common.hpp && echo "#endif" >> temp_common.hpp && cat common.hpp >> temp_common.hpp && mv temp_common.hpp common.hpp
scripts.liboqs:build: cd deps/liboqs && rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DOQS_BUILD_ONLY_LIB=ON -DOQS_USE_OPENSSL=ON -DOQS_DIST_BUILD=ON -GNinja .. && ninja
scripts.prebuild: npm run ensure_submodules && npm run liboqs:build_if_not_exists
scripts.publish:prepare: node-pre-gyp configure && node-pre-gyp rebuild && node-pre-gyp package
